Description:
Shine, a leading staffing and recruiting company, is seeking a highly motivated and professional Host or Hostess to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for ensuring a pleasant and welcoming experience for all guests and visitors. This position requires excellent communication skills, strong multitasking abilities, and a positive attitude. As a Host/Hostess with Shine, you will have the opportunity to work with a dynamic team and help contribute to the success of the company.Greet guests and visitors in a professional and friendly manner
Assist with reservations, seating, and serving as needed
Maintain a clean and organized environment in the front of house area
Answer phone calls, take messages, and respond to inquiries
Assist with basic administrative tasks as needed
Help ensure guest satisfaction by responding to feedback and addressing concerns
Work with team members to ensure a seamless and efficient service experienceJob Details
